text: hi I'm Sheila Bushman a principal
product manager at AWS I'm here to show
you how easy it is to set up and use
Amazon connect cases
Amazon connect cases makes it easy to
track collaborate on and resolve
customer issues
best of all it's built into our
cloud-based contact center Amazon
connect
with Amazon connect cases agents no
longer have to spend time digging for
information navigating windows or
entering data in multiple systems
when an agent accepts a contact they
have all of the relevant information in
front of them and they can focus on
solving the customer's issue
managers can easily add case management
to the contact center configure case
forms and monitor performance with
visualization tools
let's look at how this all works
I'm logged in as agent Sophia and I work
for Sagittarius Airlines
customers contact me when they need to
make changes to their flights or book
new reservations
just like that I'm on a chat with a
customer from the chat I see that Alex
was authenticated by the system and he
needs to make a change to an existing
reservation I see basic information
about the customer such as his account
number which is actually a frequent
flyer number and his date of birth I
immediately greet the customer and ask
for further details about the issue
while I wait for Alex to respond I
navigate to the case for more context I
see the case is called flight change and
it's related to a round-trip flight in
mid-september
great while I was checking on these
details it looks like Alex did respond
he wants to change the date of his
return and I confirm a new flight with
him
now he leaves the chat and I'm in after
contact work
I leave a comment on the case to
summarize what happened
this will help for anyone else who needs
to work on this case you see that the
comments and interactions appear in
chronological order now I could manually
Mark the case as resolved but my contact
center already has a rule that will
automatically do this in 24 hours so for
now I'll close the contact which closes
all of the related tabs
I'm now ready to accept more work to
create the agent experience I just
showed you let's look into the manager
experience I need to enable customer
profiles and cases in the AWS console
customer profiles will identify the
customer while cases will help me track
the issues
I could import customer profiles from
another database but for this demo let's
just stick with the default of creating
customer profiles within Amazon connect
in just a few clicks I'm done with that
now that we've enabled customer profiles
and cases in the console let's go into
the manager portal where the fun really
starts
first let's make sure we have the right
permissions
I'm an administrator so I have access to
the cases the case fields and the case
templates this looks good
on the fields page I'll create all of
the fields I need for my Airline contact
center
then I will navigate to the templates to
create the flight change request form
I've added the fields from highest to
lowest priority things like reservation
number the origin and destination cities
and the dates of travel
I'll just double check that this looks
right in the agent experience
okay that looks good
[Music]
now remember how agent Sophia had the
relevant case pop open as soon as she
accepted the contact
I need to configure this in the contact
flows
I want the system to identify the
customer and find a relevant case
if there isn't one I ask the customer if
they're calling about a new reservation
or an existing reservation and then I
create the relevant case
then everything gets to the agent
now the last thing to keep track of as a
manager is the performance of the
contact center and the case management
tool
I'm using the case event streams
to configure the data in Amazon
quicksite
and I see all of the cases the open
cases the closed cases and further
metrics like the average touch points
per case
I hope that in this demo you've seen how
easy it is and how powerful it is to use
Amazon connect cases we've walked
through a demo with a fictitious airline
company but we built this product to be
customized for many different industries
from Finance to health care to Legal
Services and the public sector we can't
wait to support your journey with Amazon
connect
to get started and to get more
information go to aws.com forward slash
connect thank you
